title: Body, Mind and Massage - Relaxing Together
brief_description: This creative video is a guide to relaxation and health improvement through the science and art of massage in a format especially designed for couples. Learn how to use time together for regular periods of massage therapy that can release stress and tension, relieve muscular pain and fatigue, reduce sinus conditions or headaches, even improve circulation. Fully demonstrated, easy to follow instructions allow you to quickly learn the basic principles and techniques of massage. Rated: G
